sentences.english: The sand forms a continuous transgressive blanket .
sentences.chinese: 砂質物構成一個連續的海進蓋層。

sentences.english: Then using a special knife, they cut off the lids of the cells.
sentences.chinese: 用一種特殊的刀，刮下蜂板上的覆蓋層。

sentences.english: The thicker the overburden, the smaller its anomalous value will be.
sentences.chinese: 覆蓋層越厚其異常量越小。

sentences.english: Microleakage is one of the most important pathways in which the natural gas diffuses through caprocks .
sentences.chinese: 微滲漏是天然氣通過蓋層散失的重要方式之一。

sentences.english: Soil is disturbed as little as possible and is seeded directly through existing mulch cover.
sentences.chinese: 儘量減少對土壤的干擾並通過現有的覆蓋層直接播種。

sentences.english: There are no large slipping nappe structure belts on the north depression in the Turpan Hami basin.
sentences.chinese: 吐哈盆地北部凹陷不存在大型蓋層滑脫型推覆構造帶。

sentences.english: The genetic model of hydrocarbon vertical distribution in caprock is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了蓋層烴類垂向分佈成因模式。

sentences.english: The Peak Clad location above the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 最高覆蓋層的位置位於底部的上方。

sentences.english: The caprock displacement pressure decides its sealing character.
sentences.chinese: 蓋層的排替壓力決定了蓋層的封閉性質。

sentences.english: The caprock displacement pressure decides its sealing character.
sentences.chinese: 蓋層的排替壓力決定了蓋層的封閉性質。

sentences.english: All the soil cover were stripped away.
sentences.chinese: 全部土壤蓋層都被剝去了。

sentences.english: A gap or void in the coating of a pipe or in paint on a metal surface.
sentences.chinese: 在管子覆蓋層或金屬表面塗漆層上有漏塗點或裂縫。

sentences.english: It is overlain unconformably by the post Cambrian platform cover.
sentences.chinese: 被後寒武紀地臺沉積蓋層不整合覆蓋。

sentences.english: The Liangshang Formation mudstone is the direct cap rock of the Carboniferous gas pools.
sentences.chinese: 石炭系氣藏的直接蓋層是下二疊統梁山組泥岩層。

sentences.english: The shape of cavity should be optimized in the design of anechoic coating.
sentences.chinese: 在覆蓋層設計中，空腔的形狀應有一個優化的過程。

sentences.english: Blades built up laminated hardwood and pine with ply covering overlain by glued fabric.
sentences.chinese: 刀片建立了覆蓋層的疊層膠織物覆硬木和松樹。
